= Tower of Hanoi Faster Agent =
This agent uses an even more specific representation that results in even faster execution that of the [Agent_ToH_Simple Simple Tower of Hanoi Agent] or the [Agent_ToH_Fast Tower of Hanoi Fast Agent].  The general description of the task and the agent strategy from the Simple Agent page still apply.
  
=== Soar capabilities ===
  * Basic PSCM functions: State Elaboration, Operator Proposal, Operator Evaluation, Internal Operator Application
